text: Aaruthra is a 2018 Tamil-language film directed by Pa. Vijay, who also produced the film, wrote the songs, and played the lead role with Meghali. S. A. Chandrasekhar and Bhagyaraj portray supporting roles. == Cast == * Pa. Vijay as Shivamalai (Shiva) * Meghali as Parvati * Bhagyaraj as Avudaiappan * S. A. Chandrasekhar as Shiva's father * Meera Krishnan as Shiva's mother * Gnanasambandham as Shiva's uncle * Yuva as Aaruthra, Shiva's sister * Vignesh as Nambi, Shiva's friend who betrays him * Rajendran as Avudaiappan's assistant * Sanjana Singh as Avudaiappan's wife * Y. G. Mahendran * Mayilsamy ==Soundtrack== Soundtrack was composed by Vidyasagar.https://www.hungama.com/album/aaruthra/35840210/https://gaana.com/album/aaruthra *"Chellama" - Karthik, Varsha Ranjith *"Paavadai" - Sanjana Kalmanje *"Aaruthram" -Karthik, Sriram, Narayanan Ravishankar *"Munimaa" - Sanjana Kalmanje *"Puli Onnu" - Pa. Vijay == Reception == A reviewer from The Times of India gave the film a rating of two out of five stars and wrote that "The messages put across in the film, highlighting the alarming child abuses, looks good on paper, but the execution falls flat". Sify wrote "Pa.Vijays intention to deliver a message against child abuse is laudable, the film fails big time in the execution part."https://www.sify.com/movies/aaruthra-review-amateurish- attempt-which-fails-to-create-any-impact-review-tamil-si5k66igdfajb.html == References == ==External links== * * Aaruthra on Moviebuff Category:Tamil- language films Category:2018 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Tamil- language films Category:Indian films about revenge
title: Aaruthra
